Zentail | https://www.zentail.com | Columbia, MD | On-site Full-time

Zentail's (YC S12) goal is make eCommerce simple for retailers by providing an all-in-one SaaS solution for managing multi-channel sales. Our customers manage their sales on Amazon, eBay, Walmart.com, Jet.com, their own web stores and more using Zentail as a core operating system. Making eCommerce simple often involves the challenge of taking complex problems, boiling them down to their essence and designing the easiest to use, yet complete solution possible. It can be a challenge from the UI all the way down to the infrastructure required to support it. With a small dev team, each person has to wear many hats and generally has a hand in all parts of the product development.

We are currently looking for full-stack engineers or people experienced with building and maintaining highly scalable infrastructure. Primary tech: PHP, Postgres, React

To apply: http://zentail.com/careers
